name: confyeti-shared-functions
description: Shared functions used across the Confyeti API

scripts.deploy: npm run clean & npm run zip & npm run publish
scripts.publish: aws2 --profile confyeti lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name confyeti-shared-functions --zip-file fileb://shared-functions.zip --compatible-runtimes nodejs12.x
scripts.zip: 7z a shared-functions.zip index.js & 7z a shared-functions.zip node_modules\

author: Momentum Code
